title: react JS style样式设置总结
summary: const styles = StyleSheet.create({ style_0:{ flex:1, borderColor: 'red', borderWidth:1, }, &lt;View style={styles.style_0}&gt; &lt;View style={[styles.view, styles.center]}&gt;&lt;Text&gt;自由摆放&lt;/Text&gt;&lt;/View&gt; &lt;View style={[styles.style_1, {flexDirection: 'column'}]}&gt; &lt;Text style={{marginTop:40, fontSize:25}}&gt;1／4高&lt;/Text&gt;
